name: mcp-rag-server
description: MCP server for RAG functionality with local embeddings

scripts.setup: npm run setup:ollama && npm run setup:chroma && npm run build && npm run ingest
scripts.setup:ollama: brew services start ollama && sleep 5 && ollama pull nomic-embed-text
scripts.stop: brew services stop ollama && docker compose -f docker-compose.chroma.yml down
